option: Was it you who picked them?
1.param: Master, are you satisfied with the furnishings in the room?

2.param: Was it you who picked them?

4.param: A properly decorated room can calm the mind and bring comfort, particularly when all is arranged harmoniously.

5.param: As your humble maid, ensuring this is my natural duty.

6.param: Therefore, I made some arrangements to provide you with a more relaxing experience.

7.param: If I may ask, are the results to your liking?

option: I can tell you worked hard on this...

9.param: I can tell you worked hard on this. I appreciate the sentiment.

10.param: That being said, I want you to prioritize your own comfort a little more.

13.param: Whenever you're here with me, I feel so at ease.

14.param: I want you by my side forever, and I want you to feel relaxed when you are there.

17.param: Likewise, I also feel at ease when you're by my side, my honourable Master!

18.param: My honourable Master, are you perhaps interested in my collection?

20.param: Some of them make me feel a little... concerned.

22.param: Forgive me, Master, for letting you see this unseemly side of me...

23.param: A maid in your service should never commit such a careless faux pas...

24.param: Please punish me for this shameful digression, my honourable Master!

26.param: In fact, I like this side of you.

29.param: Despite my evident indecency, you still wish to be with me and engage in...

31.param: Umm, it just occurred to me...

32.param: I once again jumped to conclusions, didn't I? I'm terribly sorry...

33.param: You seem to express a great deal of care for me, my honourable Master.

34.param: Is there anything you would like to discuss with me?

36.param: Though I will say that every time I look at you, it feels like all my stress goes away.

38.param: Easing your mind is but one of my duties as your humble maid.

39.param: Should you request it, I am always ready to be by your side.

40.param: Judging by your phrasing, am I correct in assuming that some stress still lingers within you?

41.param: If that is the case, please allow me to take care of it.

42.param: I pledge to help you completely regain your spirits so that you may resume work at full capacity!

44.param: I have work I need to do right after this, so I'm short on time...

45.param: That's not a problem! All I ask for is that you allow me to run a bath for you!

46.param: The only thing you need to do is lie back, relax, and allow me to give you my service.

47.param: Furthermore, if you should ever ask for it...

48.param: I'm fully prepared to offer myself to you!

49.param: Master... are you fond of my appearance?

51.param: I couldn't help but snap a photo.

53.param: You flatter me with your compliments, Master.

54.param: While I don't believe I deserve to be called cute, if cuteness is what you want, I shall strive to be more like that!

55.param: It is, after all, a maid's duty to do everything in power to live up to her Master's hopes and desires.

57.param: Would it be alright if I took a picture of you next time?

59.param: What do you want that for?

60.param: You always maintain an air of nobility, and I would like something to remember that by.

61.param: Just as your photo preserved my look in an instant, I want to preserve yours to cherish it.

62.param: Master, is this a gift for me?

64.param: The moment I saw this, I knew it was perfect for you. So I got it for you as a gift.

66.param: I am but your humble maid, and still you go out of your way for me like this...

option: Of course. I WANT you to have it.
68.param: Will you permit me to accept this gift?

69.param: Of course. I WANT you to have it.

70.param: Any maid worth her salt would do everything she could to grant her master's request, right?

71.param: So here's a request: take my gift.

73.param: Thank you dearly, my honourable Master.

74.param: I shall look after this gift with great care.

75.param: At the risk of sounding brazen, please allow me to give you a gift in return at this same time tomorrow.

76.param: And furthermore, please don't turn it down, okay?

77.param: Ah, you came to visit, Commander.

78.param: I have to really thank you for giving me this place to live.

79.param: Also, I was wondering... what do you think about the layout?

80.param: How do I put it... It has a strong "you" aura.

81.param: And I like the aura that you have.

82.param: So I like your quarters a lot, too.

85.param: I'm glad to hear you say that.

option: If you ever need anything else...
86.param: I'll do my best to repay your kindness.

87.param: If you ever need anything else, don't be afraid to let me know.

88.param: You really are too kind... Thank you so much.

89.param: In return, I promise to try to make anything you like come true.

90.param: Whatever it is, I'll pursue it with all my energy.

91.param: Know that I'm always ready for your orders.

92.param: Excuse me, could I have your attention?

94.param: It looked like you were checking out the things in my quarters...

95.param: Not exactly. I just hoped to learn something new about you through the things you have.

96.param: I feel like I've almost grasped something, but not quite.

98.param: I was a bit concerned you might have thought my room looked cluttered.

100.param: In fact, it's straight-faced, tidy, and orderly, just like you are.

101.param: "Straight-faced" is a strange word to describe someone's home with...

102.param: At any rate, if you want to learn more about me, you can just ask directly.

103.param: Sure, but won't I be disturbing you during your free time?

104.param: Don't worry about that. It's our responsibility to help resolve your problems.

105.param: Granted, I may not be as capable as some other people at the port are...

106.param: But still, feel free to rely on me a little more.

107.param: In the same way... that I rely on you.

108.param: Whenever we talk, it somehow feels like there are always more things to chat about.

109.param: You make me want to tell you about even little things.

110.param: You don't find that... annoying, do you?

111.param: Of course I don't. I'm glad I get to chat so much with you.

113.param: I'm really glad to hear you say that.

114.param: I've never felt this way when talking with anyone else, not even my sisters.

115.param: This urge only rises in me when I'm talking with you.

116.param: An urge, you say... I actually think I get the same thing.

117.param: You always bring such interesting topics to the table and I'm always excited about what the next one will be.

118.param: Also, you look so cute when you speak seriously.

120.param: Please don't call me cute out of the blue like that.

121.param: You really have a penchant for saying unprompted things...

122.param: But anyway... I'll be sure to come up with more interesting topics for next time.

123.param: I hope you'll pay attention the whole way through.

124.param: Don't take this the wrong way, but... it's a little embarrassing with all your attention.

125.param: Although, the happiness it makes me feel is much stronger in comparison...

126.param: Stronger than I can put into words.

127.param: I would've never imagined we'd one day become as close as we are now.

128.param: Truth be told, I wanted to build a good relationship with you since the very beginning.

129.param: I want to move into the future with you by my side.

131.param: It's a mystery what the future has in store for us, but I know one thing for certain:

132.param: You are there with me in my future.

133.param: I think we were destined for that ever since the moment we met.

option: And I'll do all I can...
135.param: I feel like there's nothing I can't do.

136.param: And I'll do all I can not to disappoint you and make sure that future comes true.

138.param: My fate, or should I say our fate, is in your hands, Commander.

139.param: Don't you think the moon looks beautiful tonight?

140.param: Feeling its soft light on my skin warms my heart...

141.param: And when I look up at the night sky, so many memories we've shared come flooding back.

142.param: Ever since I came to your side, I've learned more things than I can count.

option: You've taught me so much, too.
143.param: Each and every one of them is precious and unlike anything I've ever experienced before.

144.param: You've taught me so much, too.

147.param: Something tells me that perhaps now, my true mission in life begins...

148.param: Well, actually, it's more than just a mission.

149.param: It's a heartfelt desire to grow as a person and become more mature like my sister.

150.param: And to meet the expectations you have for me...

151.param: I sincerely hope we'll move forward together, now and forever.

152.param: Me, too. I want to be right beside you.

153.param: I'm glad. As long as you're with me, no matter where we are...

154.param: Please... just never let go of my hand.

157.param: The bed and the bedsheets too... so soft

158.param: Feeling tired? Are you going to bed?

160.param: My room is so nice... I'm sleepy

option: If you're sleepy, start by closing your eyes.

164.param: If you're sleepy, start by closing your eyes.

165.param: Okay... I will listen to you

167.param: In the stories about the two people...

168.param: They hold hands and hug when they sleep

170.param: Hold my hand and hug me... then we can sleep

171.param: Just wait until I come back. Keep your eyes closed until then.

176.param: Is there something you're missing? I can bring it with me.

177.param: Something I'm missing? I don't know

option: Wait for me to get there...
179.param: You'll know what's missing when you see it

180.param: Wait for me to get there, then I'll take a look around.

181.param: If you get sleepy, you can take a nap.

183.param: I'm not tired so I'll wait

185.param: When you're with me and I touch you

191.param: The thing I want most is you teacher!

option: Did you make food for me?

199.param: Did you make food for me?

200.param: No... It's like the thing when we hug

202.param: Hang on, are you talking about...

206.param: But now... I don't wanna give it to you teacher

207.param: I want you to hug me!

212.param: You found so many things I lost

214.param: Secret? What kind? Now I'm curious.

215.param: I have a secret somewhere... but I forgot where

216.param: I wanted to give it to you at a special time

217.param: But now I dunno where it is...

220.param: By the way, is the secret written down, by any chance?

223.param: You might not understand what it says teacher

option: Did you draw it in your sketchbook?
225.param: I drew something too! A picture!

226.param: Did you draw it in your sketchbook?

228.param: But then I took the drawing and hid it somewhere...

230.param: I gave it to you teacher

231.param: I turned the drawing and words into a paper puppy

234.param: Hehe... I'm so happy right now

235.param: You came to see me again

option: Anything in particular you want to do?
236.param: I like you more than anyone else teacher... I'll do anything with you

237.param: Is there anything in particular you want to do?

239.param: I don't know... I just want to be with you forever and ever

242.param: You teach me how to draw... and when your hands get dirty you don't wash them by yourself

244.param: I want to become as warm as you and make you happy

245.param: Alright. You can wash my hands. Is that the "more" you want?

247.param: You help me tidy up the bed and make it pretty

248.param: But I don't want it to be pretty...

249.param: Because you made it pretty I don't wanna make it messy

250.param: I want to be with you teacher

251.param: Even if it means making the bed messy

252.param: Lie down with me... I'll be so happy

253.param: You've given me so many gifts

option: I have even more gifts for you.
254.param: I love them all they're so good

255.param: I have even more gifts for you. Look forward to them.

259.param: You're always so nice to me teacher...

260.param: I want to tell you thanks in a big way

261.param: I'm really grateful for you teacher

263.param: You're super duper welcome. You bring me so much happiness, so it's the least I could do.

option: It just means I want you to enjoy the gifts...
264.param: I'm super duper welcome... Does that mean you don't need thanks?

265.param: It just means I want you to enjoy the gifts and not feel indebted or anything.

266.param: You don't need to thank family members like you thank a guest.

268.param: I'm family... That makes me so happy

270.param: That me and you are family teacher

272.param: Teacher how come I always lose?

278.param: If I win I get a reward

279.param: A big hug from you! Hehe

282.param: Does that mean I still get a reward?

287.param: If I could choose... a hug if I win

288.param: And if I lose, I get headpats then

289.param: I love playing games with you teacher

290.param: Your gift is in my hands...

291.param: We look at the sky together

option: What's wrong? Why are you sad?

293.param: What's wrong? Why are you sad?

294.param: Did you not like my gift?

297.param: Gifts from you are my favorite

298.param: But I wanna give you something

299.param: The sparkles in the sky... The stars

option: If you want to give me a star...
302.param: I don't know what to do...

303.param: If you want to give me a star...

304.param: Why don't you draw one for me?

307.param: I'll draw a star and give it to you

308.param: I'll make the prettiest sparkliest star!

309.param: I had such a nice nap next to you, honey!

option: I'd feel bad waking you up.
311.param: Why'd you just go back to work while I was asleep?!

312.param: You were sleeping so soundly that I couldn't bear to wake you.

313.param: Was someone mesmerized by my cute sleeping face?

314.param: Besides, I only fell asleep because we had so much fun together.

315.param: I'm just amazed that you had enough energy left to work...

316.param: We're supposed to be playing together, so don't flake on me!

318.param: Don't you disappear again next time, got it?!

319.param: Waking up and not having you there, honey... that thought alone gives me nightmares!

321.param: You can't worry delicate girls like me so much!

323.param: When I wake up, I want you to be there with me.

324.param: Stay with me together forever, okay, honey?

325.param: Now, finish up that work and come back to me~

326.param: I'll be waiting for you... in my soft, fluffy bed.

329.param: Are you ready to get hardcore spammed by Big J?

330.param: Someone's excited. Is your room ready? Do you need any help?

331.param: It's all good~ I just need to stock up on some daily necessities, is all...

333.param: Let's go shopping downtown. I'm sure we can get everything you need.

334.param: That's my honey! You're so thoughtful.

option: Sure. Where do you wanna go?
335.param: Since we'll go out, how about we do some other stuff, too?

336.param: Sure. Where do you wanna go?

337.param: Hehe, I've already made a whole plan!

338.param: First order of business... Filling our tummies!

option: Let me guess. Is it an ice cream buffet?

340.param: Let me guess. Is it an ice cream buffet?

342.param: Wait, do you just see me as nothing but a sweets-loving piggy?

344.param: Anyway, I'll let you know when you get here!

345.param: See you at the corner of the shopping district!

347.param: By the way, you're getting punished if you're not on time~

348.param: Honey~ Remember that action movie we watched?

349.param: Did you like it? Wanna go see the sequel?

351.param: You know! The one where the hero and heroine both go all out with their special abilities, and then they clash, and it's just

354.param: The part I liked the most was that crazy explosion!

355.param: It was almost as cool as the flames of the Black Dragon ripping through the night!

option: They should've put your name in the writing credits.
357.param: The way the main character was magically turned into a giant ball of ice cream?!

358.param: They should've put your name in the writing credits.

359.param: Nobody would come up with that unless they really loved ice cream deep down.

360.param: Hehe~ I wanna cast a spell like that on you, honey~

361.param: If you turned into an ice cream...

363.param: Melon? Watermelon? Pineapple? Hmm, I bet you'd taste even better than all of them combined~

364.param: Now I really want a taste Hehehe...

366.param: Looks like you found my treasure hoard!

367.param: That's my honey. You know me like the back of your hand!

368.param: I found a notebook. It says "Notes on the War of Love."

370.param: That's a secret! That's why it was hidden in the corner!

371.param: You didn't read it, DID YOU?

372.param: TELL ME! Tell me you totally have NOT read it!

374.param: Don't worry. I put it back.

375.param: Honey... I love you so much!

376.param: But aren't you curious what I wrote in it?

377.param: You're not worried that I'm secretly complaining about you?

380.param: I'll repay your honesty with 100% faith!

381.param: Okay, for that, you get to know one secret...

382.param: Love is like an invisible war~

383.param: You watch for the perfect time to attack, the perfect time to retreat...

384.param: Even in these tense battles of wits, though, there's one ironclad rule.

385.param: "My honey's the best in the world, and I love you more than anyone!"

386.param: You've finally returned to me, my Commander.

387.param: I cleaned every nook and cranny of this room while you were gone.

388.param: Now we can finally enjoy a world just for the two of us...

389.param: What a nice layout. I like it.

390.param: Heehee, I already know your tastes, after all.

391.param: By turning this into your favorite place, the one you'd cherish most...

392.param: I just know I can make you think of me all the time when you're away.

393.param: Yeah... I do find myself wanting to stay longer.

394.param: Use the couch, or the bed... or me... to your heart's content!

395.param: Imbue this room with your essence!

397.param: *sigh*... Time spent waiting for you goes by so slowly.

option: I'm still not done at work yet...
398.param: I want to see my Commander so badly!

399.param: I'm still not done at work yet... and I just visited a while ago, remember?

400.param: Heehee, that isn't enough. I yearn to be by your side all the time!

402.param: Just coming over for a while isn't enough at all.

option: Are you saying that was just one hour?!
403.param: From the moment you arrived until the moment you left, the clock's hand only made one little lap...

404.param: Are you saying that was just one hour?!

405.param: It feels like time slows down when I'm spending time with you.

406.param: Then stay with me even longer next time!

407.param: How does two laps of the clock's hand sound?

408.param: I'll just, umm... make time... move a little more slowly for you~

409.param: And it should all add up to more quality time with you!

410.param: My Commander, I made a packed lunch with love for you~

411.param: It's a little heavy... so I'll bring it to you in person!

413.param: I put four layers of food in the box!

414.param: The first layer is stewed pollock roe, shrimp grilled in the shell, and cold tofu...

415.param: The second one has rice balls, omelette, and fishcakes...

option: Sounds like it was made with more than just love...
416.param: Appetizers are in the third layer, and there's miso soup in the fourth!

417.param: Sounds like it was made with more than just love... This might be too much luxury for one person to handle.

419.param: Heehee, don't worry about the amount. Just eat until you're satisfied, my Commander.

420.param: Now you won't have to eat those OTHER girls' meals...

421.param: Especially not if, say, someone happened to buy up every other packed lunch in the vicinity.

422.param: It won't matter! Because you won't be able to eat any but mine, heehee!

423.param: I see you've been exploring my room again, my dear!

option: Yeah, I found some interesting stuff.
424.param: Do you think you've learned some things about me?

425.param: Yeah, I found some interesting stuff.

426.param: You look like you're having a lot of fun~

427.param: I'll let you in on a little secret  I prepared everything in this room for you!

428.param: After all, what's mine is yours. I am yours.

429.param: You should involve yourself in my daily life a little more~

430.param: What's this? A picture of some kind of plan?

431.param: Ah... That's a little pest control plan I put together. Don't pay it too much mind.

432.param: I'll make sure no pest ever bothers the two of us~

434.param: You've taken a real liking to my comfy clothes, haven't you?

436.param: Heehee, take as many pictures as you want.

437.param: My Commander's compliments make my heart flutter and dance...

438.param: But really... I shouldn't be the only one in the photo...

440.param: Isn't it just so sad to see me all on my lonesome...?

441.param: Ah... Maybe we should go to a studio that takes family photos.

442.param: They let you borrow costumes. I'd get to play dress-up with my Commander!

443.param: We can print out our portraits at full size, frame them, and hang them all over our living room...

444.param: Heehee. Then, you'll never be able to escape my gaze.

445.param: Commander! I hear it's going to get cold and snow soon.

446.param: I have an umbrella and a coat for you, so don't forget them.

447.param: Otherwise, I'll have to bring them to your office personally and help you warm up.

449.param: Also, I set up the kotatsu at home... just in case you're interested.

450.param: I want to be under the kotatsu riiight now... warming up with you.

451.param: The kotatsu, huh... Humanity's greatest invention.

453.param: When I'm holding you in my arms, I'm too absorbed in your warmth to ever let go.

454.param: But the kotatsu isn't all... I'll be snuggled up in your embrace, too.

455.param: That'll make it all the harder for you to leave, won't it?

456.param: But then I won't be able to work.

457.param: Don't you worry about that. I've already taken care of everything.

458.param: Just bring all your paperwork over to my room...

459.param: And then, you can work while you sit under the kotatsu.

460.param: I'll be with you the whole time...

461.param: Forever and ever, never leaving your side... Heehee!

462.param: I washed and dried your hat for you, my dear.

option: My hat wasn't dirty, was it?
463.param: It's on the hanger by the door, along with your coat.

464.param: My hat wasn't dirty, was it?

466.param: That's okay. You're free to feel that way. Consider it simple... disinfection, as it were.

467.param: I just can't let any other scent but mine stick to anything on your person, be it your hat, your shirt, your pants, or anything else.

468.param: Any other scent would be harmful to your health.

469.param: So I've taken it upon myself to ensure that they remain clean!

470.param: Well, it is clean. It's as good as new.

471.param: By the way, have you seen that coat I lost a while back?

472.param: Ah... I'm sorry, but I'm afraid I haven't.

473.param: If you want to wear it right now, I can absolutely do my best to make an identical one.

474.param: Then you won't have to worry about the one you lost anymore! Heehee...

475.param: Aah...! My Commander, I had no idea!

477.param: That you and I have been chatting for so long now!

479.param: There's never any shortage of things to talk about between us.

option: There's still a lot that I want to talk about with you.
480.param: All thanks to your special charisma, of course. Heehee!

481.param: There's still a lot that I want to talk about with you.

482.param: Then let's waste no time! I'll come over right away. Tell me more and more, my Commander.

483.param: Oh, but you'll get thirsty from all that talking, won't you?

option: Is it the matcha you made last time?
484.param: I'll bring tea so that you can moisten that poor, dry throat.

485.param: Is it the matcha you made last time?

486.param: Heehee~ It's roasted green tea this time.

487.param: It's the kind of tea you drink when you want to relax. It won't have the bitterness of matcha.

488.param: But if you want something really sweet...

489.param: I happen to be craving some fruity candy, myself.

490.param: Would you like to share with me...?

491.param: I've noticed how fond of my body you are, my dear.

492.param: Shall I try out a pose or two for you?

493.param: Or would you like me to give you a massage instead?

494.param: Either way, you can come a little closer... and be a little bolder...

495.param: So that I... can be your anchor

496.param: You're all I need to feel fulfilled, my Commander...

497.param: Not taking the next step right now, of all times... You're too cruel...

499.param: Since you rely on me so much, I'll have to satisfy your needs~

option: The ones that help with fatigue?
500.param: Do you know about relaxing massages, Commander?

501.param: The ones that help with fatigue?

502.param: That's correct! It's a massage where we cure your fatigue without sacrificing your relaxation.

503.param: I thought it might be useful soon, so I learned how to do it.

504.param: When you get home, my dear, just lie down in bed~ I'll give you the full massage experience...

505.param: Just release aaall of your fatigue into my waiting hands...

506.param: Aww, my Commander~ This is the tenth gift you've given me!

507.param: Whenever I'm opening a gift from you, my heart practically beats out of my chest.

509.param: Heehee, I keep a record of every gift.

510.param: Every single little present you give me...

511.param: I just know they're all filled with love

512.param: And there's no greater treasure than that, not in all the world.

513.param: So I make sure to take good care of them.

514.param: Do you remember, my Commander? When you gave me that first gift...

515.param: Aah... The feeling of my heart racing and throat dry, the sensation of almost losing myself to ecstasy...

516.param: Just remembering it almost drives me crazy.

518.param: I want you to experience those sensations, too, my Commander...

519.param: It's my turn to give you a gift.

520.param: I promise, there's no refusing or running away from this surprise...

522.param: Totally asleep. I'm definitely not working all night.

523.param: Oh, really? What a relief. Your obedience deserves a reward, doesn't it?

525.param: How can someone respond if they're sleeping? You're obviously awake!

526.param: Are you planning to go out looking like it's the end of the world tomorrow?

527.param: You have FIVE minutes. Sleep right now!

528.param: Five minutes... You know that's not fair.

529.param: Really, now? Mayhaps it's time to break out my treasured wine of the abyss.

530.param: Not that I mind, of course. I'm not the one who'll be dying of a hangover tomorrow.

531.param: Let me just tell you now. If you don't wake up tomorrow morning...

532.param: Whether you want to pray to the god of the sea or accept her gifts, the price will be steep.

533.param: Okay, I'll go to bed! Good night!

535.param: You should be excited, Commander. Be good, and naturally, you will be rewarded.

538.param: I'm just asking out of curiosity. There's no special meaning behind it.

option: I'm on my way right now.
539.param: So? Will you, or won't you?

540.param: I'm on my way right now.

option: But you want something, don't you?
541.param: You don't have to go out of your way! I really was just asking on a whim!

542.param: But you want something, don't you? I doubt you took the time to message me just for the sake of a question.

543.param: I'll be there soon, so wait for me. I need to look for my keys first.

544.param: Again, you don't have to! I just... wanted to see you...

547.param: Say something! You didn't read that message, did you?

548.param: I guess I'll just have to flood you with messages until it rolls off screen.

550.param: I suddenly have the urge to make an aquarium

551.param: Could you buy me stuff for it?

558.param: I just kind of miss you...

560.param: On the way home, I saw a manjuu cleaning a chimney.

561.param: Oh, right. Wasn't today the annual boiler room deep-cleaning?

563.param: Oh, I found a horseshoe, too.

564.param: It had three nails in it.

option: Does someone at port keep horses?

566.param: Does someone at port keep horses?

571.param: I also found a four-leaf clover in the flower bed downstairs.

572.param: I've heard of that. That's lucky, isn't it?

574.param: What I want to say is...

575.param: I've found a lot of nice things today.

577.param: Can you come over for a bit?

578.param: I guess I could share some of my luck with you.

579.param: But that doesn't mean you're guaranteed to get anything! I'm just saying I could... share with you a little, as a reward.

580.param: You've found every last thing in my room now.

option: I'll take a rain check on that.
583.param: Tell me what reward you'd like.

584.param: I'll take a rain check on that.

585.param: It looks like something of yours got stuck on my clothes, and I ended up stealing it by accident.

586.param: By accident? Hehe... You like my things that much, do you?

590.param: Give that back right now! It's mine...

option: Who else could it belong to?
592.param: It isn't mine! I don't know who that belongs to...

593.param: It's your room... Who else could it belong to?

595.param: Conceal it when you bring it back, too!

597.param: It must've gotten in your clothes while I was folding laundry...

598.param: It's a good thing you noticed.

599.param: I'll prepare a reward for you. See you soon.

600.param: You couldn't take your hands off of my hair today.

601.param: Haven't you had enough of it?

602.param: Or do you love it that much?

603.param: Do I? It wasn't because I particularly like it, or anything.

605.param: If you don't like it, then why did you do it?!

607.param: But, well... You did help me clean my room.

608.param: Thanks to you, it was easy to organize my shelves and everything.

option: I was just doing it incidentally.
609.param: Doing it alone is always such a bother...

610.param: I was just doing it incidentally.

option: It felt good to do that.
612.param: Was touching my hair all day also "incidental "?

613.param: Well, no. It felt good to do that, so I did it. Besides... I wanted to do something for you.

615.param: You're a smooth-talker, I'll give you that.

616.param: Then I expect you'll come tomorrow! I still have a box left...

617.param: And I'm not asking because I want to see you!

618.param: But if you refuse to come... I won't let you touch my hair for a whole week!

620.param: Before I knew it, I'd filled my room with your gifts.

option: I just bought them when I happened to see them.
621.param: You put a lot of thought into each and every one of them, didn't you?

622.param: Not especially. I just bought them when I happened to see things I thought you'd like.

623.param: Looking back, though, I made some pretty good choices.

624.param: Who gave you permission to be so smug?!

625.param: Goodness... I feel like such a fool, getting so excited by every little gift.

626.param: Whenever I see something, I'm always thinking about how happy you'd be if you had it.

627.param: Because I love your smile, gir.

629.param: No fair... You've already stolen my heart, but you just keep on...

630.param: At this rate, I really will...

631.param: No... Forget I said anything! That's enough!

632.param: The more I think about it, the more ridiculous it feels...

635.param: Why do you keep on winning over and over?!

637.param: I know that your victories are all fair and square!

option: This is the third time you've said that.
639.param: Next time, I'll get my revenge!

640.param: This is the third time you've said that.

641.param: Here I thought you would say something nice... How silly of me!

642.param: So that was the third time, eh?

option: I look forward to your lessons.
643.param: Just you wait! I'll show you my true power!

644.param: Oh? I look forward to your lessons, my dear Professor gir.

646.param: Is that how you mean to disrupt my focus? Well, it won't work!

647.param: Heheh... What you DON'T know is, 3 is my lucky number today!

648.param: If you've won three times, then it's my time to win!

649.param: Prepare to be swallowed by the sea!

652.param: Is there anything you're... lacking? Anything you want?

653.param: Does nothing come to mind at all?

654.param: Hmm... Don't think so. I can't think of anything.

655.param: What about you, gir? Do you want anything?

657.param: I'm the one asking you that! Can you not throw my question back at me, please?

659.param: Hmm... Nope, I've got nothing. I think I have everything I need.

661.param: Then I offer you a special service: the god of the sea will grant you one wish.

option: There'll be a meteor shower tonight.
662.param: I can't guarantee it will come true, but it's better than nothing...

663.param: They say there'll be a meteor shower tonight.

664.param: If we both make wishes on every single one, maybe it'll be more likely to work?

665.param: A meteor shower?! When does it start? Has it already?

666.param: If only I'd taken you to watch it with me...

670.param: What constellation am I seeing overhead right now?

672.param: I'm just realizing that I was actually looking at last year's forecast...

675.param: I didn't see you in the cafeteria today.

676.param: You're not replacing breakfast with coffee and energy bars again, are you?

678.param: Were you waiting in the cafeteria all morning?

680.param: I was just watching seagulls by the window, and I happened to see you going into your office.

681.param: Nothing in this port escapes my all-seeing eyes!

682.param: You have ten minutes. Come to my room right now!

684.param: And you will still have work after you eat.

685.param: I made it by hand this time... Not for you, of course. Don't misunderstand me.

686.param: Silly me, I just happened to make a few sandwiches too many. Wouldn't want to let food go to waste, now, would we?

687.param: Don't come if you don't want to. Those seagulls do look awfully hungry.

688.param: I bet they wouldn't mind some good food.

690.param: Feeding your home cooking to seagulls would be such a sad waste.

691.param: I'm glad you understand. Best come soon, then.

692.param: But if you don't finish my food... Well, you can expect an even more special treat tomorrow.

693.param: Commander, I saw the photos you sent me.

694.param: The framing and lighting are good...

696.param: Why is there a picture of my side profile among them?

698.param: At the time, I was trying to get a picture of the gramophone next to you.

700.param: Are you saying I got in the way of your photo shoot?

option: Actually, when I was lining up the shot...
701.param: Hmm, well, consider it my mistake. My apologies for getting in the way of the thing you REALLY wanted a picture of.

702.param: Actually, when I was lining up the shot, my camera just kept wandering over to you on its own. And I just happened to click the shutter...

703.param: Oh? Are you that attracted to me?

704.param: Since you were honest, I'll forgive this mistake.

705.param: Don't expect the same grace next time.

707.param: If you want pictures of me, you can just tell me.

709.param: That is, depending on my mood!

710.param: But if you brought some nice wine to soften my mood, well...

711.param: I could give you some of my time.
